context: WEX navigating competitive pressures from both traditional rivals like Corpay and emerging fintech disruptors. PayPal's GoPay and venture-backed startups intensifying competition in fleet tech space. Three-segment operation (Mobility, Benefits, Corporate Payments) with Mobility as revenue leader. Facing strategic opportunities and risks from long-term fleet deals while managing technological disruption.
